00038 class CVTranslator;

00041 ///
00042 /// interface for legacy access to Instrument
00043 /// 
00044 /// mzXML/RAMP encode instrument information as 5 strings:
00045 /// manufacturer, model, ionisation, analyzer, detector 
00046 ///
00047 /// In mzML, the equivalent information is encoded as cvParams in
00048 /// various locations in the <instrument> element.  One important 
00049 /// difference is that the manufacturer information is implicit in 
00050 /// the CV term used to encode the model.
00051 /// 
00052 /// The "set" methods use CVTranslator to translate the string(s) to an 
00053 /// appropriate cvParam.  If no CV term can be found, the information is
00054 /// encoded as a userParam.
00055 /// 
00056 /// The "get" methods look for the cvParam first, then the userParam.
00057 ///
00058 class PWIZ_API_DECL LegacyAdapter_Instrument
00059 {
00060     public:
00061 
00062     LegacyAdapter_Instrument(InstrumentConfiguration& instrumentConfiguration, 
00063                              const CVTranslator& cvTranslator);
00064 
00065     std::string manufacturer() const;
00066     std::string model() const;
00067     void manufacturerAndModel(const std::string& valueManufacturer,
00068                               const std::string& valueModel);
00069 
00070     std::string ionisation() const;
00071     void ionisation(const std::string& value);
00072 
00073     std::string analyzer() const;
00074     void analyzer(const std::string& value);
00075 
00076     std::string detector() const;
00077     void detector(const std::string& value);
00078 
00079     private:
00080     struct Impl;
00081     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00082     LegacyAdapter_Instrument(LegacyAdapter_Instrument&);
00083     LegacyAdapter_Instrument& operator=(LegacyAdapter_Instrument&);
00084 };
00085 
00086 
00087 ///
00088 /// interface for legacy access to Software
00089 ///
00090 /// mzXML:
00091 /// <software type="acquisition" name="XCalibur" version="4.20">
00092 ///
00093 /// MSData:
00094 ///   name: Software::softwareParam 
00095 ///   version: Software::softwareParamVersion
00096 ///   type: DataProcessing::processingMethods[?].userParams[?]
00097 ///
00098 /// Note: setting 'type' may create a DataProcessing object, which needs an id.
00099 /// Since the id is generated from 'name', it is an error to set 'type' before
00100 /// setting 'name'.
00101 ///
00102 class PWIZ_API_DECL LegacyAdapter_Software
00103 {
00104     public:
00105 
00106     LegacyAdapter_Software(SoftwarePtr software, MSData& msd, const CVTranslator& cvTranslator);
00107 
00108     std::string name() const;
00109     void name(const std::string& value);
00110 
00111     std::string version() const;
00112     void version(const std::string& value);
00113 
00114     std::string type() const;
00115     void type(const std::string& value);
00116 
00117     private:
00118     struct Impl;
00119     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00120     LegacyAdapter_Software(LegacyAdapter_Software&);
00121     LegacyAdapter_Software& operator=(LegacyAdapter_Software&);
00122 };

00126 } // namespace pwiz
